newsitems.title: SCP:SL Modding Community
newsitems.author: LostFire
newsitems.contents:
Thank you for installing this mod patch!

You won't be able to connect to any kind of online servers (with
in the server's config). You can type

in the game console to create a local server or you can use Dedicated Server to create more stable server.

[i]~ LostFire[/i]
